title: Number of assaults by weapon U.S. 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of assaults for 4 number of Weapon useds.
The Number of assaults is appeared to be the highest at Weapon used Other weapon and lowest at Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument.
There is a difference of 100744.0 between the maximum Weapon used Other weapon and minimum Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Weapon used, and Number of assaults in each Weapon used on the y axis.
The Number of assaults is appeared to be the highest at Weapon used Other weapon and lowest at Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of assaults for 4 number of Weapon useds.
The Number of assaults is appeared to be the highest at Weapon used Other weapon and lowest at Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument.
There is a difference of 100744.0 between the maximum Weapon used Other weapon and minimum Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of assaults for 4 number of Weapon useds.
The Number of assaults is appeared to be the highest at Weapon used Other weapon and lowest at Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument.
Weapon used Firearm has the second highest value for Number of assaults.
There is a difference of 100744.0 between the maximum Weapon used Other weapon and minimum Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument.

Weapon used Other weapon is higher than any other Weapon useds with value 223997.0, followed by Firearm, and Personal weapons. Down to Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument with the lowest value 123253.0.
The highest value 223997.0 at Other weapon is almost 1.26 times larger than the average value 177923.75.
The Number of assaults is 711695.0 if we add up values of all Weapon useds.
